Hey everyone!

In this video I go through 3 mistakes I see people make with Facebook Ads. I show you real life examples and solutions to help you get more out of your ad spend.

1. People focus on the front end and initial ads they run, with increasing facebook ad costs it's becoming more difficult to see an initial return so you have to make use of retargeting ads and LLA's.

2. Testing, people test facebook ads incorrectly in the wrong places which leads to false data and bad decisions on whether to scale or kill an adset.

3. Lack of understanding. You need to understand Facebook Ads and how they work to get good results. Simply watching a single video on youtube and copying will not, when the strategy doesn't work you become stuck because you have a lack of understanding.
